name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Mobile Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in **Xamarin**, **C#**, and **.NET** for mobile application development. Proven experience in Agile environments, utilizing **Agile**, **Scrum**, and a solid grasp of CI/CD practices to deliver robust software solutions efficiently. Strong proponent of software design patterns and adept at working in team settings, fostering collaboration and effective communication. Skilled in version control with **Git** and applying problem-solving techniques to overcome challenges in mobile development. Additionally, leveraging a strong foundation in frontend and backend development with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in AI/ML-powered platforms and cloud-native systems deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
